body:
It was requested by 99250 that I make this. Thank you 99250. 
  So, I've been making skins for a while. But I've never really told  
    anyone about it. I have a Minecraft skins account, and a PMC 
account. Feel free to follow me on both. ~ http://www.minecraftskins.com/944927/Kacers25/
~ http://www.planetminecraft.com/member/xxtehcupcakemurderer/
So anyways, time for requests. I have a few rules when it comes to requests.
                                               What Not to Request
                                                 <> Nude Skins
                                                  <> Racist Skins
                                                  <> Anything Offensive 
                                                  <> Pointless Skins ( ex: Potato with a Shotgun )
                
   If you're going to request a skin, make sure you choose wisely on 
what you want me to make you, because I'm not going to make a
second skin. I'm also a bit lazy when it comes to requests, so you're
probably not going to get your skins right away. Just be patient, because
making skins takes time. 

                                                 Some of My Skins  
                                       ~ http://kacers25.imgur.com/all/
                                                     Requests
                                                <X> Panda137 
                                                <> Slicorn
                                                <> Evocal
                                                <> Xheat
                                                <> Elibass

Oh wow. These are some awesome skins.. I would like to request a skin.

Specifications: black hair, blue jeans and hoodie (any color) With black glasses and a red shoes! I would like my hair to be length not to long and short.

Thanks! 

Also, would you consider coming in to my factory?
